Notes for Users of this document: Coding is more Phonetic in Baraha. Special care – Baraha coding uses ‘e’ and ‘o’ (in Sanskrit) for sound E and O. we have used capital letters as it matches with Unicode/general conventions in this document. ~g is nasal of ka varga (gna) ~j is nasal of cha varga (jya) H is visargam Vedic/Swara symbols – q anudAttam, # swaritam, 
$ dheerga swaritam, & avagraha,  ~M nasal symbol ushmAn codes s, S, Sha (saraswati, Sankar, puShpam) Confirm corrections given in TB 1.5-1.8 Kandam are incorporated Kindly notify any major errors or inadvertent deletions to mail id- vedavms@gmail.com These Word Documents of Baraha Source code are subject to some inadvertent editing/deletion errors. Kindly notify any errors.
